name: Move-n-Dice
description:
Roll dice and reach the end.  What is the purpose?...

First time really using blender (although following some tutorials) and it is a lot more fun than I thought.  I put a lot more effort into making the game look good / feel good rather than mechanics/story since I didn't really have a solid idea about how to use the theme and limitation together, so I ended up using the dice like this and the environment based on the theme.   I think this could serve as a good base for some more fun introducing mechanics/story, maybe in the future.  I really like the feel of it overall.  (Added a small update with some extra text)
